HomePage.heroTitle: You have a vision. I have the code to bring it to life.
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Hi, I'm Gincoder. A freelance web developer crafting beautiful, high-performance websites that captivate and convert. Ready to make your mark?
HomePage.portfolioSubtitle: Explore the digital experiences I've brought to life—each a story of collaboration and code.
HomePage.servicesTitle: Your Vision, Expertly Forged in Code
HomePage.servicesSubtitle: I offer a full suite of services to build your digital presence from the ground up, from sleek e-commerce sites to dynamic portfolios.

restaurant.title: Restaurant Showcase
restaurant.description: A modern and elegant website for a gourmet restaurant, featuring menus, reservations, and a gallery.

boutique.title: Boutique Showcase
boutique.description: A chic showcase website for a fashion boutique, highlighting the latest collections and brand story.

barber.title: Barbershop Website
barber.description: A stylish and user-friendly website for a modern barbershop, with service lists and appointment booking.

clinique.title: Medical Clinic
clinique.description: A professional website for a medical clinic, providing information on services and staff.

ecole.title: School Website
ecole.description: A showcase website for an educational establishment, detailing courses, and registration information.

formation.title: Training Showcase
formation.description: A showcase website presenting a training center's online and in-person courses.

eglise.title: Church Community
eglise.description: A welcoming website for a church, sharing event schedules, sermons, and community news.

onglerie.title: Nail Salon
onglerie.description: An elegant showcase website for a nail salon, showing services, a portfolio, and booking.

particulier.title: Personal Portfolio
particulier.description: A clean and personal portfolio website to showcase skills and projects.

GenerateImagesPage.title: AI Image Generator
GenerateImagesPage.description: Describe your project and upload a logo to generate relevant images.

form.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., A modern website for a gourmet restaurant...

validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters.

toasts.errorForm: Invalid form data. Please correct the errors and try again.
toasts.errorApiFail: AI failed to generate images. Please try again.
toasts.errorApiGeneral: Image generation failed. Please try again later.

generatedImages.title: Generated Images
generatedImages.description: Here are the images generated by the AI based on your input.
